channel.title: How to make a npc not respawn
channel.description: I am trying to make a npc not respawn on death tell me what code to put in which files server is pi dont ask questions I will rep if what you tell me solves my problem Thanks for trying

item.title: How to make a npc not respawn
item.dc:creator: @cloudslife cloudslife
item.description:
@cloudslife wrote:

Never coded PI but in the NPC file in config with a delta 317 its in there like

// NpcID NpcName combat health respawn
npc = 0 Hans 0 0 5
try there.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a npc not respawn
